title.narrative: Procurement Support Services to Ministry of Health

description.narrative: At the request of the MoH, UNDP procures a range of medicines and medical products as an emergency measure, and builds the capacity needed to support a transparent, cost-effective procurement system for the Ministry.

title.narrative: Procurement Support Services to the Ministry of Health of Ukraine

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.3.1.A

description.narrative: Country has effective measures adopted to mitigate and remedy corruption risks: At national level

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.3.1.C

description.narrative: Country has effective measures adopted to mitigate and remedy corruption risks: At sector level

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.1.1

description.narrative: National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services
